db:select.doc:name: SELECT songs
db:select.db:sql: SELECT SNG.SONG_ID, SNG.SONG_TITLE, SNG.PUBLICATION_DT, SNG.GENRE, SNG.DURATION,ALB.TITLE AS ALBUM_NM, ART.GROUP_NM, ALB.ALBUM_ID FROM BC_SONG SNG LEFT OUTER JOIN BC_ALBUM ALB ON SNG.ALBUM_ID = ALB.ALBUM_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN BC_ARTIST ART ON ALB.ARTIST_ID = ART.ARTIST_ID WHERE SONG_TITLE LIKE :songTitle
